name: Charau-ka
desc: Legend holds that charau-kas share ancestry with the demon lord Angazhan, who transformed the bodies of humans who tried to wage war against his cult, causing the dead to rise as the first of the simian humanoids known as a charau-ka.

name: Grippli
desc: Gripplis are a family of frog-like humanoids. Gripplis craft and use these weapons.
